roleset.name: reserved, energized by solitude rather than socializing
roleset.note: INTROVERTED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1. (from introverted.01-j)

example.name: the arg
example.text: However , I knew it would take me some time to adjust , because I have always been very introverted , and shy and especially anxious and all the rest of it .
